headline: What IS Global Warming?
lines:
- Greenhouse gases are important

headline: Why does it matter?
lines:
- Humankind pollutes the air and
  accelerates the greenhouse effect

- Our children will have to deal with
  weather events that will occure more
  often because of CC

- When the earth is heating up, poles and
  glaciers are smelting resulting in
  higher sea level
